conclusion_3: The prisonner has been sacrificed. You've generated a lot of magic.
event_text:
The prisonners are restless. They might require some shock therapy.
Option 1: Give them a good whack.
Option 2: Kill them
Option 3: Sacrifice them.

conclusion_1: Unbelievable! You've saved 1000$! Pat yourself on the back.
event_text:
There's a massive sale at the Walmart. Half off! Send as many cultists as you can for massive savings.
Option 1: Send 10 cultists
Option 2: Send 20 cultists
Option 3: We don't need no sales. What are we, poor?

conclusion_1: The rival cult has been destroyed and your cultists are quite satisfied. Unfortunately though, a few of them died in the attack.
conclusion_2: The rival cult has unexpectedly attacked! We've chased them off, but we've lost ten cultists. Needless to say, they're quite made you didn't let them attack first.
conclusion_3: Wise thinking. We were attacked right away, but we were ready to take them on and suffered no losses!
event_text:
A rival cult has placed its headquarters right across the street. How bold. Needles to say, our cultists are itching to give them a good beating. They might get annoyed if you don't let them attack.
Option 1: Let them have it!
Option 2: Let them be, we shouldn't take needless risks.
Option 3: Let them make the first move. They're bound to mess it up.

conclusion_1: Although you tried your best, it seems they ran away screaming the moment you tried to explain them. How rude, it's almost like they were scared of your magnificience. At least they probably won't bother us anymore.
conclusion_2: Imprison them we have. They even had some money on them, which we've taken.
conclusion_3: The police enjoyed the sacrifice so much, they gave us a lot of magic in return. A true lesson in gratefulness.
event_text:
The federal police just knocked at our door. It seems they've heard rumours of human sacrifice. We keep telling them they're wrong, but they're quite persistent. It appears they might need a little ''convincing''.
Option 1: Bring them here, I'll explain myself.
Option 2: Imprison them, they'll make good hostages.
Option 3: They're not wrong, actually. We do practice human sacrifice. I'm glad it's got them interested. I'll let them experience it first-hand, as a reward.
